Name: Fox Spirit

Not that regular black one with red glowing eyes in the forest... but unseen. There was even one in the very icelands you got this spirit from... They look like turkey's from the back but once you see their face... they arn't. Eh, neither of them, or whatever they are can't be bigfoot.
